io.zero88.jooqx

Interface ReactiveSQLBatchExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SQLBatchExecutor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReactiveJooqx, ReactiveJooqxBase<S>, ReactiveJooqxConn, ReactiveJooqxTx

    public interface ReactiveSQLBatchExecutor
extends SQLBatchExecutor
    The reactive sql executor that is adapted for SqlClient to execute batch SQL command and able to return the number of succeed row and row detail
    Since:
    1.0.0
